name: Check if the loss indicator is shown when applicable
description: Verify that the loss indicator is shown in cells, for which the exchange rate is lower than the corresponding 'Paysera amount' cell
descriptionHtml: Verify that the loss indicator is shown in cells, for which the exchange rate is lower than the corresponding 'Paysera amount' cell
statusMessage: Row for currency [HUF (Hungarian Forint)] did not have a loss indicator, even though the 'Paysera amount' (28,256.07) was larger than the 'bank amount' (26,988.13);

steps.name: Wait for the 'Exchange rate' table to be loaded
Waiting at most [10] seconds for the exchange rate table to load
Set the value of the 'Sell' field to [150]
Wait for the 'Exchange rate' table to be loaded
Waiting at most [10] seconds for the exchange rate table to load
Check if all cells contain a loss indicator if applicable
